llm_text:
Why:
The model flagged the transaction mainly because payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP=+2.98; direction=increase) was the dominant positive contributor. That effect is reinforced by a relatively high amount_paid (value=7257.05; SHAP=+0.99; increase) and the transaction occurring on dayofweek (value=6 i.e. Sunday; SHAP=+0.80; increase). Additional upward influence came from to_bank (value=12; SHAP=+0.34; increase). These positive contributions were partly offset by hour (value=19; SHAP=-0.41; decrease) and from_bank (value=23691; SHAP=-0.32; decrease).

Conclusion:
Net model score was elevated primarily by ACH payment (payment_format_ach), the payment size (amount_paid), and Sunday timing (dayofweek). Given these driver contributions, the transaction warrants analyst review; this recommendation is conditional on the named features (payment_format_ach, amount_paid, dayofweek, to_bank, hour, from_bank) being the basis for the alert.
